conditions.name: User doesn't exist / name doesn't match

metadata.description: As part of the sign up process, the user selects their preferred MFA method. Later, upon sign in, that method is triggered. Prerequisite - setup 'preferredMfaMethod' custom attribute.
metadata.name: Sign up or in using user's preferred MFA method
